name: WebGLRenderingContext.vertexAttribPointer
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.vertexAttribPointer() method of the WebGL API binds the buffer currently bound to gl.ARRAY_BUFFER to a generic vertex attribute of the current vertex buffer object and specifies its layout.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'vertexAttribPointer' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glVertexAttribPointer' in the 'OpenGL ES 2.0' specification.
